name: meltmedia
tagline: We live to make great experiences.
description:
meltmedia is an award-winning digital strategy, design, and development agency. Established in 2000 and headquartered in Tempe, Arizona, the meltmedia team consists of over 80 onshore, in-house designers, developers, and strategists who live to create the world's most inspiring digital experiences. Its portfolio of leading national biotech, pharmaceutical, healthcare, and other industry clients includes Genentech (a member of the Roche Group), HonorHealth, and Scholastic.
meltmedia has been named the #1 web design agency, #1 mobile development firm, a top five software company, and a best place to work by the Phoenix Business Journal, and an Inc. 5000 fastest-growing company in America. Visit meltmedia online at meltmedia.com.
